thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 11 of 1749
thread.title: Ghita

author: Ghita
title: Ghita
text: I like using Flighthub to compare the fares before booking a flight. The website usually provides the best fare so I end up booking it through it. I would love it if the emails sent by flighthub when I'm shopping for a trip could be a little more informative and less spamy (avoid sending me an email to tell me that there a better price to my trip while it's still the same price). But great service overall
